Integration Instructions

To display your actual Google Reviews, you'll need to integrate with the Google Places API or use a Google Reviews widget service. Here are your options:

  • • Use Google Places API to fetch and display reviews dynamically
  • • Install a Google Reviews widget plugin for your platform
  • • Use third-party services like Elfsight or EmbedSocial
  • • Manually embed reviews using Google's embed code
